1a1('bum): / 'bum ka pa bzhugs so//
1b1('bum): @##// rgya gar skad du/ shata sAha sri ka prad nyA pAr mi tA/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ glegs bam thog ma/ bam po dang po// 'di skad
1b2('bum): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri/ bya rgod 'phungs po la/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra
1b3('bum): bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/
1b4('bum): khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid bar kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag bas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha
1b5('bum): stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la pa lnga brgya
2a1('bum): tsam dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang / chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad med grangs pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab
2a2('bum): tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad
2a3('bum): mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams ba/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang
2a4('bum): srog la lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa pa/ kha gsag pa/ grags pa dang / khe dang bkur sti'i sems ba/ zang zing pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs
2a5('bum): su zhum pa pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad ba/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom ba/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
2a6('bum): thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ thog mar smra ba/ khro gnyer pa/
2b1('bum): snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ spobs pa chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan
2b2('bum): pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/
2b3('bum): sems yongs su zhum pa pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che
2b4('bum): dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/ las dang / nyon mongs pa dang /
2b5('bum): lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul zad shes pa la zhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams
2b6('bum): cad spangs pa/ las dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad pa la 'jigs pa
2b7('bum): pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin
3a1('bum): rtag tu rgyun chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/ sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi
3a2('bum): bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a3('bum): chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3a4('bum): ded dpon dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyob sbed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos
3a5('bum): byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang po'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo
3a6('bum): gros 'phel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib med blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson
3b1('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying
3b2('bum): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dpe med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin
3b4('bum): chen phyag rgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrag
3b6('bum): khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/ sku drang por bsrangs te/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas ting nge
3b7('bum): 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin
4a1('bum): de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od gzer rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan
4a2('bum): pa gnyis las 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / / zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs kyi long bu gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //
4a3('bum): zhabs byin pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs pus mo gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // sku
4a4('bum): sta zur gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / / sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // sku rtsib logs gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // thugs ka'i
4a5('bum): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo / / phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // phyag lag ngar gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung
4a6('bum): byung ngo / / sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // mgur nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // tshems mche ba bzhi las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // tshems
4a7('bum): bzhi bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / / spyan gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // snyan gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // shangs kyi sbubs
4b1('bum): gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // steng gi spyi gtsug nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // zhal gyi sgo nas
4b2('bum): kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ste/ 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
4b3('bum): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab
4b4('bum): par byas so/ / byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs
4b5('bum): mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi
4b6('bum): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
4b7('bum): byas so/ / sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od gzer rab tu dgye
5a1('bum): ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig
5a2('bum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so//
5a3('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig
5a4('bum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba
5a5('bum): chen pos khyab par byas so/ / steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
5a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
5a7('bum): snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ / lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang phyogs su 'jig
5b1('bum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// shar phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi
5b2('bum): bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gAng ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad
5b3('bum): do/ / 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des
5b4('bum): gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyurato/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas/ ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags
5b5('bum): kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/ 'od gzer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi
5b6('bum): mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin ti ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la yang de bzhin
5b7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/
6a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos
6a2('bum): bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ / de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
6a3('bum): gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing
6a4('bum): de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa
6a5('bum): drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ / de dag lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di
6a6('bum): nyid kyi chos ston to/ / de dag nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag 'og gi phyogs
6a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
6b1('bum): gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
6b2('bum): gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/
6b3('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so/ rab tu g.yos so/ kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to/ rab tu 'gul to/ kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem
6b4('bum): chem/ kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad
6b5('bum): la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to/ de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang /
6b6('bum): ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par lhung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te// sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtsho ma dang / dga' ldan
6b7('bum): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang / mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /
7a1('bum): mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na bder dong zhing phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
7a2('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang
7a3('bum): lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang
7a4('bum): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
7a5('bum): rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
7a6('bum): rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe
7a7('bum): rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
7b1('bum): bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ nub phyogs
7b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag
7b3('bum): thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams
7b4('bum): bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
7b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song
7b6('bum): gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang /
7b7('bum): mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
8a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur
8a2('bum): to/ / de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang
8a3('bum): rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par
8a4('bum): gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing
8a5('bum): phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
8a6('bum): khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang dang lhar
8a7('bum): skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang
8b1('bum): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
8b2('bum): rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams
8b3('bum): cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang /
8b4('bum): nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran bar gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
8b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig
8b6('bum): yud tsam thang cig la/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/
8b7('bum): mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par
9a1('bum): gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
9a2('bum): bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/
9a3('bum): steng gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par
9a4('bum): gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam bar skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran
9a5('bum): nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/
9a6('bum): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
9a7('bum): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang
9b1('bum): mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur
9b2('bum): ba de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
9b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to// 'on
9b4('bum): pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ / smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa pa'i sems thob par gyur to// gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par
9b5('bum): gyur to/ / bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to// skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// ngal ba
9b6('bum): rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to/ / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems can
9b7('bum): thams cad la dper na/ pha dang ma dang phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' ba dang / gnyen pa dang / grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang
10a1('bum): gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta
10a2('bum): bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ / de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/ dul ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// bden pa ni dge ba'o/ bag byed pa ni dge ba'o/ byams pa ni dge
10a3('bum): ba'o/ / snying rje ni dge ba'o/ srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang / kye ma sems can 'di dag 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o//
10a4('bum): dul ba ni dge ba'o// zhi ba ni dge ba'o sdom pa ni dge ba'o// bden pa ni dge ba'o/ bag byed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge ba'o// snying rje ni dge ba'o// tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa ni dge ba'o// srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes pa'i
10a5('bum): shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/ zla ba nya'i zla
10a6('bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa gtsang ma'i
10a7('bum): gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku
10b1('bum): mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me
10b2('bum): lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
10b3('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku
10b4('bum): mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes
10b5('bum): shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du
10b6('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
10b7('bum): gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes
11a1('bum): shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri
11a2('bum): rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste
11a3('bum): dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas
11a4('bum): pa dang / gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang / 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ stong gsum gyi
11a5('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang /
11a6('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
11a7('bum): sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi
11b1('bum): byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha rdzas u dpal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / so'u gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /
11b2('bum): lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug spos
11b3('bum): dang / u dpal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / so'u gan d+hi dang / me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor
11b4('bum): to/ / mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/
11b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
11b6('bum): ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du
11b7('bum): gnas par gyur to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang / lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to// mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to// rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to// me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
12a1('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang / shin tu mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
12a2('bum): gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /
12a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
12a4('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing
12a5('bum): gsal bar gyur to/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
12a6('bum): snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// 'og
12a7('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal
12b1('bum): bar gyur to/ / de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i
12b2('bum): gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos
12b3('bum): ston to snyam mo/ / shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
12b4('bum): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
12b5('bum): rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin
12b6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes
12b7('bum): pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems
13a1('bum): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
13a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
13a3('bum): bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos
13a4('bum): ston to snyam mo/ / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs pa kun
13a5('bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
13a6('bum): pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/
13a7('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung snang gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
13b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
13b2('bum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi
13b3('bum): mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to
13b4('bum): snyam mo/ / chung dge'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med dge ba'i
13b5('bum): lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin
13b6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi
13b7('bum): shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung che'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/
14a1('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/
14a2('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems
14a3('bum): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
14a4('bum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun
14a5('bum): na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
14a6('bum): shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to
14a7('bum): snyam mo/ / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
14b1('bum): de bzhin du stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
14b2('bum): shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
14b3('bum): bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog shes pa mthong nas/ 'di
14b4('bum): snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od
14b5('bum): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang
14b6('bum): rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
14b7('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
15a1('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
15a2('bum): kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
15a3('bum): cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong
15a4('bum): bar gyur to/ / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
15a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
15a6('bum): khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
15a7('bum): dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi
15b1('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar
15b2('bum): gyur to/ / 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
15b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang
15b4('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang
15b5('bum): thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ / 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
15b6('bum): kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
15b7('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
16a1('bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten
16a2('bum): gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
16a3('bum): rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed
16a4('bum): 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
16a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ / 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar lho'i phyogs
16a6('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur
16a7('bum): to/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de
16b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen
16b2('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
16b3('bum): sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod
16b4('bum): pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang
16b5('bum): chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ / 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
16b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// nub
16b7('bum): byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
17a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can
17a2('bum): gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po
17a3('bum): mthong bar gyur to/ / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
17a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ci snyed cig yod pa de dag
17a5('bum): thams cad kyis/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// steng
17a6('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
17a7('bum): shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa
17b1('bum): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa
17b2('bum): mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi
17b3('bum): shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
17b4('bum): sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad
17b5('bum): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
17b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes
17b7('bum): bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/
18a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
18a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang / phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
18a3('bum): bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la
18a4('bum): bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la/ pad+mo
18a5('bum): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/
18a6('bum): nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig
18a7('bum): rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
18b1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su
18b2('bum): 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug
18b3('bum): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu
18b4('bum): 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
18b5('bum): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
18b6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste pad+mo gser gyi
18b7('bum): mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
19a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid
19a3('bum): brtsams te chos ston to/ / chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu
19a4('bum): byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas
19a5('bum): so/ / phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa// de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
19a6('bum): pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
19a7('bum): po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang
19b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
19b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de
19b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
19b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
19b5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te
19b6('bum): de 'dra 'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
19b7('bum): ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub
20a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang / phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du
20a2('bum): mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20a3('bum): sangs rgyas mya ngan pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
20a4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod
20a5('bum): dam zhes kyang zhus shig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/
20a6('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/
20a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
20b1('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems
20b2('bum): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
20b3('bum): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
20b4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri
20b5('bum): ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//
20b6('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
20b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol
21a1('bum): tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/ / chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
21a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
21a3('bum): shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ / bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya
21a4('bum): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag
21a5('bum): par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de
21a6('bum): mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
21a7('bum): 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
21b1('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
21b2('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
21b3('bum): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
21b4('bum): 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen
21b5('bum): bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/
21b6('bum): de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
21b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
22a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/
22a2('bum): bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes kyang zhus shig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par
22a3('bum): gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag
22a4('bum): blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
22a5('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang / bdug spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang
22a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
22a7('bum): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
22b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma
22b2('bum): stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
22b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
22b4('bum): gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to//
22b5('bum): chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i
22b6('bum): gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so//
22b7('bum): de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang
23a1('bum): po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa'
23a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
23a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od
23a4('bum): chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
23a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/
23a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
23a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i
23b1('bum): dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub
23b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan
23b3('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos
