157b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du chos gang la la chos rnams dang 'du ba 'am/ 'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'phrad pa 'am/ mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
157b2('bum): des chos gang 'du ba 'am/ 'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'phrad pa 'am mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
157b3('bum): brtson zhes bya'o/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du bdag gis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam 'gyur zhes bya bar mi
157b4('bum): sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa do// mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do// mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
157b5('bum): spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang / tha dad par yang dag par
157b6('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
157b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba byed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra
158a1('bum): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam khong du chud par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar
158a2('bum): sems te/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba do// de yang 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// sha ra dwa
158a3('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
158a4('bum): dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su sbyor ro// tshor ba dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang tshor bar sbyor ro// 'du shes dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du shes su sbyor ro// 'du byed dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/
158a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang 'du byed du sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par sbyor ro// dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang tu sbyor ro// rna ba dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang
158a6('bum): rna bar sbyor ro/ / sna dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang snar sbyor ro// lce dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lcer sbyor ro// lus dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus su sbyor ro// yid dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/
158a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang yid du sbyor ro// gzugs dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su sbyor ro// sgra dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgrar mi sbyor ro// dri dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang drir sbyor ro// ro dang stong
158b1('bum): pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ror mi sbyor ro// reg dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg tu mi sbyor ro// chos dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos su sbyor ro// gi khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang
158b2('bum): gi khams su sbyor ro/ / gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su sbyor ro// gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su
158b3('bum): sbyor ro/ / rna ba'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i khams su mi sbyor ro// sgra'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su mi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/
158b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su sbyor ro// sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i khams su mi sbyor ro// dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang dri'i khams su sbyor ro// sna'i rnam
158b5('bum): par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ / stong pa nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// lce'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su sbyor ro// ro'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor// stong pa
158b6('bum): nyid dang ro'i khams su sbyor ro/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// lus kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi khams su sbyor ro//
158b7('bum): reg bya'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg bya'i khams su sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su sbyor ro// yid kyi khams dang stong
159a1('bum): pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su sbyor ro// chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du sbyor/ stong
159a2('bum): pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su sbyor ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni/ nyan
159a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra
159a4('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ rab ces bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
159a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i rnal 'byor te/ bla na pa'i rnal 'byor to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ bla na med
159a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can tshad grangs pa'i don byed kyang / de 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson
159a7('bum): pa yin nam zhe 'am/ brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston pa mdzad do// bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to// bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// bdag
159b1('bum): gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya'o/ / bdag gis ni bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings
159b2('bum): la bye brag tu 'byed pa de/ de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba 'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
159b3('bum): 'tshang rgya ba/ de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi 'du shes skye'o// bdag gi 'du shes skye'o// srog gi
159b4('bum): 'du shes skye'o/ / 'gro ba'i 'du shes skye'o// gso ba'i 'du shes skye'o// skyes bu'i 'du shis skye'o// gang zag gi 'du shes mi skye'o// shed can gyi 'du shes skye'o// shed bdag gi 'du shes skye'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes skye'o// tshor ba
159b5('bum): po'i 'du shes skye'o/ / shes pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o// mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te/ sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do// gang la skye
159b6('bum): ba dang 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/
159b7('bum): sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can rang bzhin
160a1('bum): med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal
160a2('bum): 'byor dam pa ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor te/ des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas
160a3('bum): so/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo// 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
160a4('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mngon par sgrub bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni/ ser sna'i sems mi skyed do// tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang
160a5('bum): gnod par sems pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi skyed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
160a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha
160a7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang nang nas shi
160b1('bum): 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa
160b2('bum): ste/ tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon tu 'gyur ro// de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
160b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de
160b4('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang dbang po rno bar 'gyur ro// de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/ de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams
160b5('bum): cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/ dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/ phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par
160b6('bum): dbang po rtul ba yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no// de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon tu mi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang khyod kyis de skad du byang chub
160b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ zhes smras pa ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/
161a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam
161a2('bum): yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs
161a3('bum): kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas kyang des nga rgyal du mi byed do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag/ bsam gtan dang po la yang mnyam par gzhog/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang mnyam
161a4('bum): par gzhog/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang mnyam par gzhog/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang mnyam par gzhog cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang spyod de/ de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing / gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas/
161a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur byed na yang / de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po rno ba yang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
161a6('bum): pa la yang spyod de/ de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/ dbang po rno ba ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
161a7('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/
161b1('bum): byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
161b2('bum): la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang snyoms par
161b3('bum): 'jug/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dbang po lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug/ stobs lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang snyoms par
161b4('bum): 'jug/ snying rje chen po la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye/ tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/
161b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do// de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
161b6('bum): tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/
161b7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/
162a1('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin
162a2('bum): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis skye'o// de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/
162a3('bum): de yang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyis/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan
162a4('bum): gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/
162a5('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shis med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug
162a6('bum): cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis skye ba yang yod de/ de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam
162a7('bum): par skye'o/ / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par
162b1('bum): skye ste/ de dag na gnas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub
162b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag/ thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par
162b3('bum): 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
162b4('bum): mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes med 'du shes med skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de/ de dag ni 'di
162b5('bum): nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ / de dag de na yang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na yang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te/ de dag de na 'khod cing gang na/ de bzhin
162b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing 'dong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
162b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
163a1('bum): pa dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams
163a2('bum): pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
163a3('bum): yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang yongs su sgom/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang yongs su sgom/
163a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang yongs su sgom/ dbang po lnga la yang yongs su sgom/ stobs lnga la yang yongs su sgom/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang yongs su sgom/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang yongs su sgom/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
163a5('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing / de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ dga'
163a6('bum): ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o/ / de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas/ dbang po mnyam pa dang / dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te/ mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te/ bla na med pa yang
163a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dag kyang yod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu
163b1('bum): gcig pa/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye bar/
163b2('bum): de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
163b3('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag/ mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang
163b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag/ mngon par
163b5('bum): shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
163b6('bum): dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing /
163b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi legs pa rjod/ chos kyi legs pa rjod/ dge 'dun gyi legs pa rjod pas/ sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te/ de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom
164a1('bum): ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin cad bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi
164a2('bum): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
164a3('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad
164a4('bum): dag kyang thob nas/ de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye zhing / de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
164a5('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
164a6('bum): chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas phung po ma lus
164a7('bum): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
164b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
164b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
164b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/ tshul du
164b4('bum): mas rnam par rtse zhing / 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/
164b5('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms
164b6('bum): par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las
164b7('bum): langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog
165a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms
165a2('bum): par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i
165a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems
165a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra
165a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thob pa/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa/ dbang po lnga thob pa/ stobs lnga thob pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
165a6('bum): lag brgyad pa thob pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa/ bsam gtan rnams thob pa/ tshad med pa rnams thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa/ stong pa nyid dang
165a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
165b1('bum): 'dres pa brgyad thob pa dag/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po thob kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed/ rang byang
165b2('bum): chub thob par mi byed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed de/ sems can de dag des rgyun tu zhugs
165b3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha
165b4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi
165b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs
165b6('bum): su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
165b7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa/ mngon par shes pa drug thob ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ 'jigs
166a1('bum): pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres brgyad thob pa dag/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang
166a2('bum): yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams
166a3('bum): nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing de dag gi sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa
166a4('bum): grangs med tshad med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par brtson
166a5('bum): te/ nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra/ gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems
166a6('bum): can rnams kyi don rtag tu brtson pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
166a7('bum): phyin pa drug la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang /
166b1('bum): bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang / gos 'dod pa
166b2('bum): rnams la gos dang / nor bu 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang / byi ru 'dod pa rnams la byi ru dang / rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang /
166b3('bum): 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin
166b4('bum): pa drug la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha
166b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams khro ba pa dang / gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
166b6('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub
166b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// dge ba bcu'i
167a1('bum): las kyi lam gyi bar la sems can rnams rab tu bkod nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og gyi lha'i bar du skye zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
167a2('bum): rgya'o/ / shar dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs nas/ bsam gtan las yongs su nyams te/ bsam gtan dang po'i ro myangs nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba yang yod do// de yang
167a3('bum): bsam gtan bsgrubs nas 'og gyi lhar skyes te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshangs pa'i 'jig
167a4('bum): rten nas shi 'phos nas/ gnas gtsang mar skyes te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas gcig gam/ gnyis rgal te/ 'og min du skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya
167a5('bum): ba yang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/
167a6('bum): sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos ston pa dag kyang yod do// sha
167a7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
167b1('bum): dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de
167b2('bum): dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis
167b3('bum): thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang
167b4('bum): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po
167b5('bum): yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems
167b6('bum): can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi
167b7('bum): zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar
168a1('bum): byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub
168a2('bum): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye bdag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po
168a3('bum): yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong
168a4('bum): zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag
168a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag
168a6('bum): skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems
168a7('bum): dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /
168b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston
168b2('bum): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su
168b3('bum): bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// nub byang gi
168b4('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas
168b5('bum): kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu
168b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
168b7('bum): la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i
169a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// steng gi phyogs kyi
169a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
169a3('bum): yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang
169a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
169a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan dang / gzugs pa'i ro rmyongs nas tshangs ris nas/ dge rgyas kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/
169a6('bum): srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob par
169a7('bum): gyur pa de/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang / byang chub sems dpa'
169b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/ dbang po gsal zhing lus yongs su dag pa dang / ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa
169b2('bum): de dag gis skye bo mang po'i dga' ba dang / mos pa skyed de/ de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ mthar kyis theg pa gsum
169b3('bum): gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o//
169b4('bum): ngag yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa de dag dbang po shin
169b5('bum): tu gsal ba thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis/ bdag mi stod cing / gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems
169b6('bum): bskyed phyin cad/ sbyin pa'i pha tu phyi nad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha tu phyin dpal gnas shing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing / log par mi 'gro ba dang / ngan song
169b7('bum): du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dang po sems bskyed phyin cad/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba
170a1('bum): dag kyang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i
170a2('bum): rgyal por gyur nas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
170a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing /
170a4('bum): de dag la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang /
170a5('bum): mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
170a6('bum): kyis snang bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa
170a7('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs shing / nyan thos rnams kyang pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de thabs mkhas pas srog chags brgya
170b1('bum): stong bye ba phrag mang po theg pa gsum gyis yongs su smin par byas nas/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
170b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang /
170b3('bum): ngag dang / yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
170b4('bum): po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
170b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing / 'di ni lus yin gyis/ des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni ngag yin gyis/ des ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni yid yin gyis/
170b6('bum): des ni yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na/ de ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
170b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/ lus gang dang / ngag gang dang / yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ gnod
171a1('bum): sems kyi sems bskyed pa 'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus dmigs so// ngag
171a2('bum): dmigs so/ / sems dmigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len
171a3('bum): skyed pa dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du ni shes par mi bya ste/ de ni gnas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
171a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo // ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo // yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus kyi
171a5('bum): las kha na ma tho ba pa'o/ / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba pa'o// yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lus kyi gnas
171a6('bum): ngan len sbyong ba lags/ ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
171a7('bum): lus dmigs/ ngag dmigs/ sems dmigs na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs
171b1('bum): su sbyong ba yin/ yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed phyin cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag
171b2('bum): par blangs te gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
171b3('bum): lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi lam yongs
171b4('bum): su sbyong zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
171b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
171b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang / ngag la dmigs pa med pa dang / yid la dmigs pa med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa
171b7('bum): med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / nyan
172a1('bum): thos kyi theg pa la pa med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la pa med pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la pa
172a2('bum): med par gyur pa de ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la pa cing blang ba pa dang / dor ba pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
172a3('bum): chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa'i rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan
172a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la rlom sems pa dang / tshor ba la rlom sems pa dang / 'du shes la rlom sems med pa dang / 'du byed la
172a5('bum): rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang / dang gzugs la rlom sems pa dang / rna ba dang sgra la rlom sems pa dang / sna dang dril rlom sems med pa dang / lce dang rol rlom sems med pa dang / lus dang reg
172a6('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang / yid dang chos la rlom sems med pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chu'i khams la rlom sems pa dang / khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / nam mkha'i
172a7('bum): khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzugs kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /
172b1('bum): rna ba'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sgra'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sna'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / dri'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes
172b2('bum): pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / ro'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lus kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / reg bya'i khams la
172b3('bum): rlom sems med pa dang / / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chos kyi khams la rlom sems pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rten
172b4('bum): cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
172b5('bum): phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / phyi nang
172b6('bum): stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus ma byas
172b7('bum): stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom
173a1('bum): sems pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems pa dang / pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
173a2('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rlom sems pa
173a3('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / dbang po lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / stobs lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems
173a4('bum): med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par thar pa
173a5('bum): brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid la rlom sems pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rlom sems pa dang / mngon
173a6('bum): par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems
173a7('bum): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sems pa dang / byams pa chen po la rlom sems pa dang / snying rje chen po la rlom sems pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
173b1('bum): 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / lam
173b2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / 'khor ba la rlom sems med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
173b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye
173b4('bum): shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su skye/ mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/ lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na smad par 'gyur ba
173b5('bum): de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
173b6('bum): dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par
173b7('bum): mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
174a1('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi
174a2('bum): zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye bdag kyang mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
174a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de
174a4('bum): lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+g+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems
174a5('bum): dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
174a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'
174a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo //
174b1('bum): chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
174b2('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par
174b3('bum): phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
174b4('bum): rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/
174b5('bum): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
174b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
174b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye
175a1('bum): shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos
175a2('bum): kyang nyan to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// chos
175a3('bum): kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ / dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed
175a4('bum): do/ / gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do// ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//
175a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
175a6('bum): tu phyin pa so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi so// nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ nang stong
175a7('bum): pa nyid so/ / phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi stong pa nyid so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid so// chen po stong pa nyid sgom ste/
175b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid mi so// don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi
175b2('bum): so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/
175b3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang gi
175b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi so/ / mi pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mi pa stong pa nyid mi so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ ngo bo nyid stong
175b5('bum): pa nyid so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom ste/
175b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po lnga sgom ste/ dbang po rnams mi so// stobs lnga sgom ste/ stobs rnams mi so// byang chub kyi
175b7('bum): yan lag bdun sgom ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
176a1('bum): mi dmigs so/ / bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs so// tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom ste/ gzugs
176a2('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi
176a3('bum): dmigs so/ / stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid mi so// mtshan ma med pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma med pa mi so// smon pa med pa sgom ste/ smon pa med pa mi so// mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams
176a4('bum): mi so/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
176a5('bum): rnams mi dmigs so/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs so// byams pa chen po sgom ste/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs
176a6('bum): so/ / snying rje chen po sgom ste/ snying rje chen po mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad sgom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mi so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
176a7('bum): mi dmigs so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid sgom ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid so//
176b1('bum): rang byang chub sgom ste/ rang byang chub mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
176b2('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
176b3('bum): kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i
176b4('bum): mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
176b5('bum): stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do// sha
176b6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
176b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad lnga brgya mthong ba yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad drug brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
177a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bdun brgya mthong ba yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgyad brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
177a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad dgu brgya mthong ba yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
177a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis 'dzam+bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis
177a4('bum): gling gsum mthong ba yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis
177a5('bum): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i
177a6('bum): mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
177a7('bum): chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
177b1('bum): rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
177b2('bum): dpas rab tu shes so/ / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs ris kyi
177b3('bum): lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni
177b4('bum): byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung snang gi lha
177b5('bum): rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub
177b6('bum): sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung dge'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med dge ba'i lha nams kyi
177b7('bum): lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
178a1('bum): chung che'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha
178a2('bum): rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
178a3('bum): rab tu shes so/ / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i
178a4('bum): mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i
178a5('bum): mig de ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha
178a6('bum): rnams kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//
178a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems
178b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
178b2('bum): lha'i mig de ni snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung snang gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams
178b3('bum): kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa'
178b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung dge'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge
178b5('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung che'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang
178b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
178b7('bum): lha'i mig de ni mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
179a1('bum): kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis
179a2('bum): mi shes te/ lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan
179a3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
179a4('bum): po ni nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
179a5('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
179a6('bum): sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi
179a7('bum): 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shis so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//
179b1('bum): lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan
179b2('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
179b3('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'iklung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// //
179b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
179b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba 'am/ dge ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba
