179b6('bum): med pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang
179b7('bum): ldan pas/ chos gang yang ma mthong ba med/ ma thos pa med/ ma bsams pa med/ khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom
180a1('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
180a2('bum): chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang
180a3('bum): po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ / de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom dang tshul khrims
180a4('bum): dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed
180a5('bum): de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang
180a6('bum): shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i
180a7('bum): dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ / dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
180b1('bum): bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod
180b2('bum): chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi
180b3('bum): 'ong ba'o/ / de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la
180b4('bum): gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro//
180b5('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab
180b6('bum): tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed
180b7('bum): de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/
181a1('bum): zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ji yang rung
181a2('bum): ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes bya bar shes pas/ dad pa la pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o//
181a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
181a4('bum): spyod do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi
181a5('bum): dbang po dang ldan te/ thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te/ lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed do// dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// bram ze che zhing
181a6('bum): mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o// mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o// dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o// 'phrul dga'i
181a7('bum): lha'i nang du skye'o/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// de de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
181b1('bum): yongs su dag par byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
181b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar tu phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
181b3('bum): 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
181b4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/ / 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o// 'di ni nges pa'o// 'di ni ma nges pa'o// 'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste// dbang po thob pa'o// 'di dag ni
181b5('bum): phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste/ dbang po ma thob pa'o// 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas
181b6('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/
181b7('bum): lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do//
182a1('bum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud
182a2('bum): dang / mchod pa byed do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
182a3('bum): phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim
182a4('bum): gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes
182a5('bum): par byed do/ / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
182a6('bum): rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
182a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
182b1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing / de bzhin
182b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ / rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dis ni mngon par shes pa
182b3('bum): thob par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o// 'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no// 'di ni dbang po thob pa'o// 'di ni dbang po thob pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par
182b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
182b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o/ / 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so// 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i
182b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'di la legs pa brjod pa mdzad do// 'di la ni legs pa brjod pa mi mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
182b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/
183a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro// 'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med
183a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur
183a3('bum): ro/ / 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no// 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'dug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag la ni
183a4('bum): bdud yod par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
183a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rnam pa
183a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ / de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ brgyad dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa chen po
183a7('bum): dang ldan pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin/ btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/ de ni de'i ste/
183b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang ldan pas/ rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
183b2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yongs su dag pa'o/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas
183b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa de/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /
183b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus zhes brjod pa zhig tu dgos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe
183b5('bum): na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig lnga skyed pa'o// mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa
183b6('bum): ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do// de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo
183b7('bum): bar byed do/ / gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro// mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang ba dang / mi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do// rtseg pa las thal ba dang / rab las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis
184a1('bum): 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul ba byed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no//
184a2('bum): chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no// du bar 'thul zhing myer 'bar te/ dper na phung po chen po bzhin no// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas
184a3('bum): byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir des rdzu 'phrul gang
184a4('bum): gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu dmigs te/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
184a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa las 'das pas lha dang gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/
184a6('bum): lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rna ba dang sgrar pa do/ de thams cad mkhyen pa
184a7('bum): nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa tsam yang skyed do/ / de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par
184b1('bum): shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ / des sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang
184b2('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag
184b3('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
184b4('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
184b5('bum): du rab tu shes so/ / sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
184b6('bum): du rab tu shes so/ / nye bar len pa pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
184b7('bum): shes so/ / rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya chung ba'i sems la rgyu chung ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya che ba'i sems
185a1('bum): la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i
185a2('bum): sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag
185a3('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
185a4('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
185a5('bum): rab tu shes so/ / zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
185a6('bum): shes so/ / nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na med pa'i
185a7('bum): sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do// de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya
185b1('bum): bar rlom sems med do/ / 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems
185b2('bum): shes par bya ba'i bsam pa 'am/ sems shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad
185b3('bum): kyi sems dang / spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par sgrub ste/ sems gcig kyang rjes su
185b4('bum): dran pa nas/ sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// zla ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas zla ba brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas lo brgya'i bar
185b5('bum): du yang rjes su dran no/ / bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa brgya phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa stong phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal
185b6('bum): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug/ tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig
185b7('bum): tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/ che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas don rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi
186a1('bum): gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab
186a2('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ / de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de// 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi
186a3('bum): so/ / de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
186a4('bum): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang bzang ba dang /
186a5('bum): ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang / yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log
186a6('bum): par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/ ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis
186a7('bum): legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi
186b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar
186b2('bum): de ma yin zhing bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i de
186b3('bum): lta bu des te/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i mig gi bsam pa 'am/ lha'i mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
186b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / lha'i mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
186b5('bum): rgyas kyis thob par mi byed do/ / gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yang mi mthong ngo // de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
186b6('bum): mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar byed de/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom
186b7('bum): sems de/ de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu so// de ni thams cad
187a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/ zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa 'am zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems
187a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de
187a3('bum): ltar spyod cing / mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
187a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
187a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba bya ba med pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba
187a6('bum): dag kyang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'khrug pa nye bar bzung
187a7('bum): bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha'
187b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'khrug pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang
187b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa
187b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
187b5('bum): phyir 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa nye bar bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no// de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// tshul
187b6('bum): khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ / bzod pa ni 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so//
187b7('bum): shes rab ni shes rab 'chal pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags te/ de ni rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems do// ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems do// sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// sbyin pa mi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//
188a1('bum): tshul khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems do// tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems do// bzod pa phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems do// khro ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems do//
188a2('bum): brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems do// le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems do// mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems do// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems do// shes rab dang ldan
188a3('bum): no zhes bya bar rlom sems do/ / shes rab 'chal pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems do// phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems do// rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems do// rim gro
188a4('bum): ma byas so zhes bya rab rlom sems do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro ma
188a5('bum): byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/ 'di la sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
188a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/ de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
188a7('bum): yang yongs su dag par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i
188b1('bum): sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob bo// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god
188b2('bum): do/ / de ni tshe 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byon cing dben par bya ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya
188b3('bum): ba yin/ / de ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang / de dang de dag tu nam yang gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs mthong ngo // rna bas yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos so// snas yid du 'ong ba'i dri tshor ro// lces yid du 'ong ba'i ro myong ngo //
188b4('bum): lus kyis yid du 'ong ba'i reg bya reg go/ yid kyis yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
188b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyam par 'gyur ro/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong sum brgyas gos gyon gyon pa bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
188b6('bum): chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
188b7('bum): 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad
189a1('bum): pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag
189a2('bum): ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig 'das nas/ bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ de
189a3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o/ / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug cus kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag kyang de bzhin
189a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang / de dag bla na med pa yang dag par
189a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe 'khor bzhi po de dag ni 'di na 'khod bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//
189a6('bum): nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// lho
189a7('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//
189b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na yod par ma mthong ngo // de nas
189b2('bum): 'khor de'i nang nas/ srog chags stong phrag bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las spyad par bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs
189b3('bum): su chud nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom
189b4('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo srog chags
189b5('bum): stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
189b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
189b7('bum): ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa bshes pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / dge slong gzhan dag kyang kun gyis mngon par shes pa
190a1('bum): shin tu mang ba dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang / dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
190a2('bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems
190a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
190a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab bo// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
190a5('bum): phyin pa phul lo/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog go/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub
190a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gya nom pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzang po'o// bcom ldan
190a7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
190b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltag na ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
190b2('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
190b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
190b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang gi mtshan nyid
190b5('bum): stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
190b6('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
190b7('bum): yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
191a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thug pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub
191a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo / / yongs su gtong ngo // yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
191a3('bum): gyur to/ yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
191a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs so//
191a5('bum): srung ngo // srung bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur
191a6('bum): to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
191a7('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so/ / sgom mo// sgom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//
191b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
191b2('bum): pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so//
191b3('bum): rtsom mo// rtsom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i las thob
191b4('bum): par kyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
191b5('bum): phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan bskyed do/ / skyed do// skyed par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
191b6('bum): su rdzogs par gyur to/ / yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla
191b7('bum): na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ / 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes
192a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms so/ / sgom mo// sgom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par
192a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ / de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob
192a3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par
192a4('bum): gyur to/ / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
192a5('bum): bar gyur to/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to// mnyam pa
192a6('bum): dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to/ / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ mnyam pa dang
192a7('bum): mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/ / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par 'gyur ro// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
192b1('bum): tshor ba thob par 'gyur ro/ / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par 'gyur ro// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par 'gyur ro// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub
192b2('bum): tu mngon par byang chub nas/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs
192b3('bum): thob par gyur to/ / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to// mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob
192b4('bum): par gyur to/ / mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to// de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad
192b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du
192b6('bum): bcas pas/ phyag bgyi ba lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
192b7('bum): kyi bu dag de de bzhin no/ / de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa dag ni lha dang dang lha ma yin du bcas pas/ phyag bya bar 'os pa'o// de ci'i phyir
193a1('bum): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ mi'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du
193a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen
193a3('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mche ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul
193a4('bum): dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs
193a5('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med snang ba'i
193a6('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / kun snang dang pa'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med dge ba'i lha
193a7('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig
193b1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig
193b2('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten du
193b3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
193b4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
193b5('bum): bzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / khyim dang / 'tsho ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo
193b6('bum): byad rkyen dang / lha rdzas su bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bral ba'i bde ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems
193b7('bum): dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ bdag sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro// bdag tshul khrims srung zhing / gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro// bdag bzod pa
194a1('bum): sgom zhing gzhan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro/ / bdag brtson 'grus rtsom zhing gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro// bdag bsam gtan skyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro// bdag shes rab sgom zhing gzhan yang
194a2('bum): shes rab sgom pa la sbyor ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing / sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs
194a3('bum): pa thams cad 'thob bo/ / rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde pa'i don tu zhugs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram
194a4('bum): ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur to// de byung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
194a5('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas
194a6('bum): par gyur to/ / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs
194a7('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
194b1('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen
194b2('bum): pos rgyas par gyur to/ / de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom
194b3('bum): ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni
194b4('bum): nub phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/
194b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
194b6('bum): snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen
194b7('bum): pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
195a1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
195a2('bum): phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od
195a3('bum): rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so//
195a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni shar phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
195a5('bum): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen
195a6('bum): pos khyab par mdzad do/ / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
195a7('bum): la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dge snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni lho phyogs
195b1('bum): logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
195b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma

195b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
195b6('bum): pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis
195b7('bum): 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so// sangs
196a1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
196a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
196a3('bum): po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
196a4('bum): gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
196a5('bum): bu dag 'di ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang
196a6('bum): po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
196a7('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi
196b1('bum): khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags/ zhes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mjed ces bya
196b2('bum): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
196b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
196b4('bum): chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris
196b5('bum): so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
196b6('bum): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab
196b7('bum): par mdzad do/ / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
197a1('bum): 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
197a2('bum): kyi bu dag 'di ni 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/
197a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
197a4('bum): dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de
197a5('bum): la phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
197a6('bum): gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na dengs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la spyi bos
197a7('bum): phyag 'tshal nas/ lan bdun du g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te/ phyogs bcu nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gser gyi me tog dang /
197b1('bum): dngul gyi me tog la pa rnam pa du ma khyer te/ glu dang rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de nas rgyal chen
197b2('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad
197b3('bum): med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma pa shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / che ba dang /
197b4('bum): gdung ba dang / 'og gyi lha rnams kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pal dang / pad mo dang / ku mud dang / pun d+ha ri ka dang / lha rdzas kyi man dwa ra ba dang / man dwa ra ba chen po
197b5('bum): dang / ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha de dag gis me
197b6('bum): tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la
197b7('bum): gtor to/ / mngon par gtor to// de nas me tog la pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa cha kun tu mnyam pa/
198a1('bum): shin tu rnam par phye ba mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar red de 'dug go/ de nas 'khor de'i nang na/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/
198a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gang brnyes par gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu thams cad
198a3('bum): thob par gyur te/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'di lta bu ni yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o// da ltar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du 'khor 'di dang 'dra bar ni chos bstan par bgyi'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan
198a4('bum): 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/ chos thams cad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'byung ba pa la bzod par gyur par mkhyen nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
198a5('bum): dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs
198a6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis
198a7('bum): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / de dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na/ bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi
198b1('bum): yan lag me tog ces bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste/ gnyis so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
198b2('bum): bam po bcu gsum pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtsom ste/ ji
198b3('bum): nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs pa skyed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag
198b4('bum): dang / lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang / spobs pa tsam gyi stobs dang / shugs kyi go cas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston tam/ 'on tam sangs
198b5('bum): rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems
198b6('bum): kyis yongs su shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra yang rung / gang ci ston kyang rung / gang ci rjod kyang rung ste/ de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/
198b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa de thams cad kyang chos nyid dang 'gal lo// de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni chos bstan pa de la slob cing chos nyid de lta bu mngon du byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems
199a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs kyis ston pa mdzad kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ni/ nyan thos dang
199a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
199a3('bum): zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma
199a4('bum): mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni su zhig/
199a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
199a6('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i du bya ba de dag ni tsam ste/ de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can sems can zhes
199a7('bum): bya bar ming du gdags pa'i ming de ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa de/ de ni nang na yang / phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka
199b1('bum): med par yang so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag bdag ces bya bar du gdags pa'i de ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag
199b2('bum): pa de/ de ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ srog srog ces bya bar du gdags pa'i ming de ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni dang
199b3('bum): brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa de/ de ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka par yang so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gro ba 'gro ba zhes bya bar du gdags
199b4('bum): pa'i de ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa de/ ming de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
199b5('bum): so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gso ba gso ba zhes bya bar du gdags pa'i de ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med ces
199b6('bum): de ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang / gnyis ka med par yang so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu skyes bu zhes bya bar du gdags pa'i de ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni dang brda tsam du
199b7('bum): tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa de/ de ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med gnyis ka med par yang so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gang zag gang zag ces bya bar du gdags pa'i de
200a1('bum): ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa de/ de ni nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka par
200a2('bum): yang so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shed can shed can zhes bya bar du gdags pa'i ming de ni btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am/

204a7('bum): de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya ba dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/ chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
204b1('bum): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya bar ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa de// de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka
204b2('bum): par yang so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nang gi lus zhes bya ba 'di ni tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/ mgo'i rus pa zhes du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / mjing pa'i rus pa zhes du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / phrag
204b3('bum): pa'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / dpung pa'i rus pa zhes du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / tshigs pa'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / dpyi'i rus
204b4('bum): pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / brla'i rus pa zhes du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / rje ngar gyi rus pa zhes du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang / rkang pa'i rus pa zhes du tha snyad kyis gdags pa de dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du
204b5('bum): zad de/ chos su btags pa de la 'di lta ste/ mgo'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang / mjing pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang / phrag pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang / dpung pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang / tshigs pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /
204b6('bum): dpyi'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang / brla'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang / rje ngar gyi rus pa zhes bya ba dang / rkang pa'i rus pa zhes bya bar dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa de/ de ni nang na yang / phyi rol na yang
204b7('bum): / gnyis ka med par yang dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i du bya ba dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/ chos
205a1('bum): su btags pa de la ni dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/ de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang / gnyis ka par yang so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
205a2('bum): dper na/ gang 'di phyi rol gyi rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma zhes bya ba de dag thams cad kyang sna tshogs kyis tha snyad du brjod de/ de dag kyang dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par/ skye ba 'am 'gag pa

205a4('bum): dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/ chos su btags pa de la ni dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa de/ de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang / gnyis ka med par yang so//
205a5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mtshan tsam zhig yod pa'ang / mtshan de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka par yang so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lam dang /

229b7('bum): tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de 'dus byas kyi khams na yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'dus ma byas kyi khams na yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor de
230a1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

232a6('bum): par rjes su mthong ngo / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyang yang

232b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sangs
