238a1('bum): nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do// rang gi
238a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do// dngos po
238a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba med do// dbang po
238a4('bum): rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do/ / stobs rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags par 'gyur ba do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
238a5('bum): la chags par 'gyur ba do/ / bsam gtan rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// tshad med pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// rnam par thar pa brgyad la
238a6('bum): chags par 'gyur ba do/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la chags par 'gyur ba med do// stong pa nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do// mtshan ma med pa la chags par 'gyur ba do// smon pa med pa la chags par 'gyur ba do//
238a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags par 'gyur ba do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la chags par 'gyur ba med do// 'jigs pa
238b1('bum): bzhi la chags par 'gyur ba do/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la chags par 'gyur ba med do// byams pa chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do// snying rje chen po la chags par 'gyur ba med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la
238b2('bum): chags par 'gyur ba med do/ / de bzhin nyid la chags par 'gyur ba do// yang dag pa'i mtha' la chags par 'gyur ba med do// chos kyi dbyings la chags par 'gyur ba do// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la chags par 'gyur ba med do//
238b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la chags par 'gyur ba do// thabs mkhas pa la chags par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang chags par byed pa 'am// gang gis chags par bya ba 'am/ gang la chags par bya
238b4('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos thams cad pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par
238b5('bum): 'phel lo/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rnam par 'phel lo// byang chub
238b6('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / phyir ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas kyang /
238b7('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
239a1('bum): 'das rnams blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror
239a2('bum): bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du skye bar 'gyur ro// sangs
239a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang thos par 'gyur te/ ji skad du thos pa'i chos de dag kyang / nam bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang thob
239a4('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dang brdar bya ba'i chos su gdags pa rnams de ltar khong du chud par bya'o// //

243b6('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
243b7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gi khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
244a1('bum): gi khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/

249b3('bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
249b4('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i khams pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khams byang
249b5('bum): chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/
249b6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
249b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la khams yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
250a1('bum): du sems/ khams pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi
250a2('bum): khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin
250a3('bum): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma

250a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
250a7('bum): mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma

255a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
255a7('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin
255b1('bum): nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin
255b2('bum): snyam mam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol
255b3('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
255b4('bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
255b5('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
255b6('bum): du sems/ gi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan
255b7('bum): zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol
256a1('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la gi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom

260b7('bum): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/
261a1('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol
261a2('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom
261a3('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
261a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
261a5('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
261a6('bum): sems dpa' la sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems
261a7('bum): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
261b1('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
261b2('bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
261b3('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i
261b4('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de
261b5('bum): bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
261b6('bum): gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub
261b7('bum): sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
262a1('bum): yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems
262a2('bum): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
262a3('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//

262a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
262a6('bum): du sems/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
262a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin

263a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin

263a6('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ reg bya'i

263b1('bum): nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i la reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod
263b2('bum): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/

264a1('bum): du sems/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi
264a2('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang

264b7('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub
265a1('bum): sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan

265a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
265a4('bum): sems/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa

265a6('bum): mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
265a7('bum): de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
265b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
265b2('bum): sems/ khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khams kyi
265b3('bum): de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/

265b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
265b7('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
266a1('bum): dpa' la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid
266a2('bum): pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin
266a3('bum): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/
266a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
266a5('bum): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
266a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
266a7('bum): snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
266b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i
266b2('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams
266b3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/
266b4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
266b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
266b6('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang
266b7('bum): chub sems dpa' la ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid pa zhig byang chub sems
267a1('bum): dpa' yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/

267a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/

270a5('bum): po brgyad pa/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
270a6('bum): ma yin/ gzugs la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs yod pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// tshor ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan
270a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang tshor ba yod pa ma yin/ tshor ba pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du shes kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du
270b1('bum): shes ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du shes yod pa ma yin/ 'du shes pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyang byang chub
270b2('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du byed yod pa ma yin/ 'du byed pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
270b3('bum): yin/ / rnam par shes pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa yod pa ma
270b4('bum): yin/ rnam par shes pa pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
270b5('bum): la yang yod pa ma yin/ mig med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rna ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
270b6('bum): dpa' la yang rna ba yod pa ma yin/ rna ba med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// sna yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
270b7('bum): dpa' la yang sna yod pa ma yin/ sna med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// lce yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
271a1('bum): dpa' la yang lce yod pa ma yin/ lce med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// lus kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus la yang byang chub sems dpa'
271a2('bum): yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus yod pa ma yin/ lus med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// yid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid la yang byang chub sems
271a3('bum): dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid yod pa ma yin/ yid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs la
271a4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs yod pa ma yin// gzugs pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
271a5('bum): yin/ sgra la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra yod pa ma yin/ sgra med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// dri yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
271a6('bum): yin/ dri la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang dri yod pa ma yin/ dri med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// ro yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
271a7('bum): yin/ ro la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro yod pa ma yin/ ro med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// reg kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
271b1('bum): yin/ reg la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg yod pa ma yin/ reg med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
271b2('bum): ma yin/ chos la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang chos yod pa ma yin/ chos med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// mig gi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams ma yin
271b3('bum): pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi khams yod pa ma yin/ mig gi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// gzugs
271b4('bum): kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs kyi khams
271b5('bum): yod pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi
271b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rna ba'i
271b7('bum): khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i khams yod pa ma yin/ rna ba'i
272a1('bum): khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ / sgra'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa'
272a2('bum): yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra'i khams yod pa ma yin/ sgra'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma
272a3('bum): yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i

277b2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam
277b3('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ / lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi
277b4('bum): de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang
277b5('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma
277b6('bum): yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub
277b7('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams

278a3('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems

288b4('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du
288b5('bum): byed kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnam
288b6('bum): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang
288b7('bum): chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis//
289a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la mig gi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ mig gi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub
289a2('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ mig gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ mig gi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub
289a3('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ma lags
289a4('bum): pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis
289a5('bum): pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sna'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sna'i de bzhin nyid

289a7('bum): mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la lce'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ lce'i de bzhin nyid

290a1('bum): par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan

293b7('bum): lta yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa
294a1('bum): gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la
294a2('bum): 'gyur/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems
294a3('bum): dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la
294a4('bum): chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la me'i
294a5('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
294a6('bum): mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
294a7('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing na/ de la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/
294b1('bum): rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta
294b2('bum): yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
294b3('bum): ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang
294b4('bum): ga la 'gyur/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
294b5('bum): kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub
294b6('bum): sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis//
294b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta
295a1('bum): yang ga la mchis/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang
295a2('bum): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma
295a3('bum): lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin
295a4('bum): nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la
295a5('bum): mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i
295a6('bum): de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la ming dang gzugs kyi
295a7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par
295b1('bum): yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
295b2('bum): dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/
295b3('bum): skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta
295b4('bum): yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub
295b5('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub
295b6('bum): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma
295b7('bum): lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ tshor ba'i de bzhin
296a1('bum): nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur
296a2('bum): ba lta ga la mchis/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la sred pa'i de bzhin nyid

296a5('bum): dpa' la len pa'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de la srid pa'i de bzhin
296a6('bum): nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/

296b3('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ de la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
296b4('bum): dpa' mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi'i de bzhin nyid mchis par yang ga la 'gyur/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta yang ga la mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan
296b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/ rab 'byor gang yang 'di
296b6('bum): skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs kyi tshig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
296b7('bum): de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
297a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes kyi tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

299b1('bum): sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed zhi ba'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
299b2('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed ma zhi ba'i tshig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam
299b3('bum): par shes pa zhi ba'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa ma zhi ba'i tshig
299b4('bum): yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom
299b5('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs mi stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
299b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
299b7('bum): pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba mi stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
300a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang
300a2('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes mi stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
300a3('bum): 'di 'du byed stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed mi stong pa'i tshig bla
300a4('bum): dgas yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam//
300a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa mi stong pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
300a6('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
300a7('bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
300b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
300b2('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
300b3('bum): sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
300b4('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba
300b5('bum): 'di 'du byed mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed mtshan ma med
300b6('bum): pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla
300b7('bum): dgas yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i tshig
301a1('bum): yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla
301a2('bum): dgas yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gzugs smon pa med pa'i tshig yin snyam mam//
301a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba smon pa yod pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
301a4('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di tshor ba smon pa med pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
301a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes smon pa yod pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
301a6('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du shes smon pa med pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
301a7('bum): snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed smon pa yod pa'i tshig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
301b1('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di 'du byed smon pa med pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
301b2('bum): ba 'di rnam par shes pa smon pa yod pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di
301b3('bum): rnam par shes pa smon pa pa'i tshig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang ji zhig la brten nas/ 'di skad du/ gzugs kyi
301b4('bum): tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ tshor ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ 'du shes kyi tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ 'du byed kyi tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma
301b5('bum): yin zhes zer/ rnam par shes pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ de bzhin du/ gzugs rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
301b6('bum): tshor ba rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes mi rtag pa'i tshig byang chub
301b7('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ / 'du byed rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par
302a1('bum): shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ / gzugs bde ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma
302a2('bum): yin/ / tshor ba bde ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du shes bde ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes sdug
302a3('bum): bsngal ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ / 'du byed bde ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rnam par shes pa bde ba'i
302a4('bum): tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// gzugs bdag yod pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs bdag
302a5('bum): pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ / tshor ba bdag yod pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba bdag med pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du shes bdag yod pa'i tshig
302a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes bdag med pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du byed bdag yod pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed bdag pa'i tshig
302a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ / rnam par shes pa bdag yod pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa bdag pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// gzugs zhi ba'i tshig byang chub
302b1('bum): sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs ma zhi ba'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// tshor ba zhi ba'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba ma zhi ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du
302b2('bum): shes zhi ba'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes ma zhi ba'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du byed zhi ba'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed ma zhi ba'i tshig
302b3('bum): / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma zhi ba'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// gzugs stong pa'i
302b4('bum): tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs mi stong pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// tshor ba stong pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba mi stong pa'i tshig bla
302b5('bum): dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ / 'du shes stong pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes mi stong pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du byed stong pa'i tshig /
302b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed mi stong pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rnam par shes pa stong pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa mi stong pa'i
302b7('bum): tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba
303a1('bum): mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du shes mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig byang
303a2('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du byed mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed mtshan ma med
303a3('bum): pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i tshig / byang chub sems
303a4('bum): dpa' ma yin/ / gzugs smon pa yod pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// tshor ba smon pa yod pa'i tshig byang
303a5('bum): chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba smon pa med pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// 'du shes smon pa yod pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes smon pa med pa'i tshig
303a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ / 'du byed smon pa yod pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed smon pa med pa'i tshig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// rnam par shes pa
303a7('bum): smon pa yod pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i tshig / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs
303b1('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba'i tshig bla
303b2('bum): dgas su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das/ 'du shes shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes kyi tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das/ 'du byed
303b3('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed kyi tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par shes pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam
303b4('bum): par shes pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa
303b5('bum): shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rtag pa'i
303b6('bum): tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs
303b7('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes mi rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/
304a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems
304a2('bum): dpa' 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das mi
304a3('bum): rtag pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das bde ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bde ba'i
304a4('bum): tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das bde ba shin tu ma
304a5('bum): mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba bde ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i tshig
304a6('bum): su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das bde ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes bde ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi
304a7('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das bde ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed bde ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom
304b1('bum): ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das bde ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
304b2('bum): shes pa bde ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom
304b3('bum): ldan 'das bdag shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bdag mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das bdag ma mchis pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems
304b4('bum): dpa' gzugs bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba bdag mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis//
304b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag ma mchis pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub
304b6('bum): sems dpa' 'du shes bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ma mchis pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la
304b7('bum): mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed bdag mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das bdag ma mchis pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/
305a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa bdag mchis pa'i tshig
305a2('bum): su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ma mchis pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das zhi ba shin tu
305a3('bum): ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba tra lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das ma zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs ma zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta
305a4('bum): ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das ma zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba
305a5('bum): ma zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das ma zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi
305a6('bum): dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes ma zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis//
305a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ma zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed ma zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes
305b1('bum): pa zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das ma zhi ba shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par shes pa ma zhi ba'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das stong pa shin tu ma mchis
305b2('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs stong pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das mi stong pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi stong pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga
305b3('bum): la mchis/ / bcom ldan 'das stong pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba stong pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das mi stong pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba

306a1('bum): shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig su 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis// bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma med pa shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs

307a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ gzugs kyi tshig mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes kyi tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed kyi tshig mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i
307a2('bum): tshig mi dmigs pa dang / / gzugs rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs mi rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // tshor ba mi rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa
307a3('bum): dang / / 'du shes rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes mi rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // 'du byed rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // rnam par shes
307a4('bum): pa rtag pa'i tshig mi pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // gzugs bde ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba bde
307a5('bum): ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes bde ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed bde ba'i tshig bla
307a6('bum): dgas mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // rnam par shes pa bde ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // gzugs bdag yod
307a7('bum): pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs bdag pa'i tshig mi pa dang // tshor ba bdag yod pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba bdag med pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // 'du shes bdag yod
307b1('bum): pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes bdag med pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // 'du byed bdag yod pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed bdag med pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // rnam par shes pa bdag yod
307b2('bum): pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // gzugs zhi ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs ma zhi ba'i tshig mi dmigs pa dang // tshor ba zhi ba'i tshig
