362b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten
362b2('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par rjes
362b3('bum): su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems
362b4('bum): dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
362b5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
362b6('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par
362b7('bum): rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/
363a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de
363a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag
363a3('bum): gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba
363a4('bum): dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan
363a5('bum): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin
363a6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das de ltar
363a7('bum): bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub
363b1('bum): sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing bstan par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig brtags par bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis
363b2('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ dge 'dun gyi de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ byang chub sems dpa'i de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma
363b3('bum): mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma
363b4('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la du gdags par
363b5('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis
363b6('bum): byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi
363b7('bum): brdar bgyi ba dang / chos su gdags pa de yang gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/
364a1('bum): ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
364a2('bum): 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna
364a3('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/
364a4('bum): sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ dang gzugs sam/ skye mched
364a5('bum): drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
364a6('bum): pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/
364a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/
364b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
364b2('bum): sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad
364b3('bum): pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
364b4('bum): pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po
364b5('bum): 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ lam zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//
364b6('bum): sgyu ma zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgra brnyan zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yor zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// smig rgyu zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang
364b7('bum): brjod du ma mchis so/ / chu zla zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis/ kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' zhes
365a1('bum): bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / sa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chu zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang
365a2('bum): brjod du ma mchis so/ / rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//
365a3('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos nyid ces bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi dbyings zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi gnas
365a4('bum): nyid ces bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / chos skyon pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
365a5('bum): pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// brtson
365a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang
365a7('bum): brjod du ma mchis so/ / tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// shes rab ces bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rnam par
365b1('bum): grol ba zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rgyun
365b2('bum): tu zhugs pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis
365b3('bum): so/ / phyir 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// phyir 'ong ba'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so//
365b4('bum): dgra bcom pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so/
365b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ni gang gis
365b6('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchis te/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i yang dge ba 'am dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug
365b7('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag ma mchis pa 'am/ zhi ba 'am ma zhi ba 'am/ dben pa 'am ma dben pa 'am/ dngos po 'am dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang de
366a1('bum): lta bu mthong ba'i slad du/ de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba du gdags
366a2('bum): pa ni bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro zhes gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar de ni gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ma mchis pas de ltar na de ni gnas pa ma mchis
366a3('bum): thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod de/ rnam pa 'di dag dang / tshul 'di dag dang / mtshan ma 'di dag gis bstan
366a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ sems zhum par 'gyur yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / 'gyod pa ma mchis la 'jigs sngang skrag par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
366a5('bum): sa la gnas par rtogs par bgyi ste/ gnas pa zhes bgyi ba ni gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ des gzugs
366a6('bum): la gnas par bgyi'o/ / des tshor ba la gnas par bgyi'o// des 'du shes la gnas par bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des la gnas par bgyi'o//
366a7('bum): des rna ba la gnas par bgyi'o// des sna la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce la gnas par bgyi'o// des lus la gnas par bgyi'o// des yid la gnas par bgyi'o/ des gzugs la gnas par bgyi'o// des sgra la
366b1('bum): gnas par bgyi'o/ / des dri la gnas par bgyi'o// des ro la gnas par bgyi'o// des reg la gnas par bgyi'o// des chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des rna ba'i
366b2('bum): rnam par shes pa la gnas par bgyi'o/ / des sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des yid kyi rnam par shes
366b3('bum): pa la gnas par bgyi'o/ / des gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas
366b4('bum): par bgyi'o/ / des lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
366b5('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas par bgyi'o/ / des sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas par bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
366b6('bum): la gnas par bgyi'o/ / des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas par bgyi'o// des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des chu'i khams la gnas par bgyi'o// des khams la gnas par bgyi'o//
366b7('bum): des rlung gi khams la gnas par bgyi'o// des nam mkha'i khams la gnas par bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par bgyi'o// des ma rig pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par mi
367a1('bum): bgyi'o/ / des rnam par shes pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des dang gzugs la gnas par bgyi'o// des skye mched drug la gnas par bgyi'o// des reg pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des tshor ba
367a2('bum): la gnas par bgyi'o/ / des sred pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des len pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des srid pa la gnas par bgyi'o// des skye ba la gnas par bgyi'o// des rga shi la gnas par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du
367a3('bum): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
367a4('bum): kyang gzugs so/ / tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong
367a5('bum): ste/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid
367a6('bum): gang lags pa de yang 'du byed ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang
367a7('bum): lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
367b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ des gzugs la gnas par bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par bgyi'o// des 'du shes la gnas par bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par bgyi'o//
367b2('bum): des rnam par shes pa la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de yang 'di ltar gis stong ste/ gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ma lags/ las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ nyid kyang stong pa
367b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang go/ rna ba rna bas stong ste/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba ma lags/ rna ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna snas stong ste/ sna'i stong pa nyid
367b4('bum): gang lags pa de yang sna ma lags/ sna las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce lces stong ste/ lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce ma lags/ lce las gud na yang stong pa
367b5('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus lus kyis stong ste/ lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus ma lags/ lus las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
367b6('bum): kyang lus so/ / yid yid kyis stong ste/ yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid ma lags/ yid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/
367b7('bum): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra sgras stong ste/ sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
368a1('bum): yang sgra ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri dris stong ste/ dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dri ma lags/ dri las gud na yang stong pa
368a2('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro ros stong ste/ ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ro ma lags/ ro las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg reg
368a3('bum): gis stong ste/ reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang reg ma lags/ reg las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos chos kyis stong ste/ chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa
368a4('bum): de yang chos ma lags/ chos las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos so// gi rnam par shes pa gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang

373b1('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
373b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs lnga la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang stobs rnams
373b3('bum): ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
373b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la
373b5('bum): gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag
373b6('bum): rnams ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang
373b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
374a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar lam lam gyis stong ste/ lam gyi stong pa nyid gang lags
374a2('bum): pa de yang lam ma lags/ lam las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
374a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i
374a4('bum): bden pa bzhi la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
374a5('bum): yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan
374a6('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
374a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan bzhi la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ bsam
374b1('bum): gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das
374b2('bum): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
374b3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshad pa rnams tshad pa rnams kyis stong ste/ tshad pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang
374b4('bum): lags pa de yang tshad pa rnams ma lags/ tshad pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshad pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshad pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
374b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
374b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis
374b7('bum): stong ste/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/
375a1('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
375a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
375a3('bum): tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam
375a4('bum): par thar pa rnams ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
375a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
375a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
375a7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
375b1('bum): rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/
375b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
375b3('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo
375b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pas stong ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i stong pa nyid
375b5('bum): gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam
375b6('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
375b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
376a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
376a2('bum): stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang
376a3('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
376a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
376a5('bum): la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'jigs pa rnams 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/
376a6('bum): 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'jigs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
376a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'jigs pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa
376b1('bum): rnams la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
376b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan
376b3('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
376b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong / snying rje
376b5('bum): chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang byams pa chen po ma lags/ de yang snying rje chen po ma lags/ byams pa chen
376b6('bum): po dang snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
376b7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
377a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
377a2('bum): pa rnams kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs
377a3('bum): rgya sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
377a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par bgyi ste/ yi ge mngon par
377a5('bum): bsgrub pa la gnas par bgyi/ gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par bgyi/ gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par bgyi/ tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams
377a6('bum): kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yi ge rnams ma lags/ yi ge rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
377a7('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
377b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
377b2('bum): pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
377b3('bum): des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
377b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
377b5('bum): rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan
377b6('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
377b7('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs
378a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams
378a2('bum): so/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
378a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs rtag pa nyid gzugs rtag pa nyid kyis stong
378a4('bum): ste/ gzugs rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs
378a5('bum): rtag pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
378a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba rtag pa nyid tshor ba rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
378a7('bum): tshor ba rtag pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
378b1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i
378b2('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes rtag pa nyid 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes rtag pa nyid las gud na yang
378b3('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
378b4('bum): 'du shes rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mi rtag go
378b5('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed rtag pa nyid 'du byed rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed
378b6('bum): rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
378b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
379a1('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes
379a2('bum): pa rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
379a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
379a4('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags
379a5('bum): pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan
379a6('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
379a7('bum): tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
379b1('bum): yang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang
379b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar
379b3('bum): gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes sdug bsngal
379b4('bum): ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
379b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas
379b6('bum): par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags
379b7('bum): 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
380a1('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas
380a2('bum): par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa
380a3('bum): sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam
380a4('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
380a5('bum): chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag pa nyid gzugs bdag pa nyid kyis stong
380a6('bum): ste/ gzugs bdag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs bdag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs bdag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs bdag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
380a7('bum): gzugs bdag pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o/ des shes
380b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba bdag pa nyid tshor ba bdag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba bdag pa
380b2('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba bdag pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba bdag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba bdag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba bdag pa nyid do// bcom ldan
380b3('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
380b4('bum): 'du shes bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes bdag med pa nyid 'du shes bdag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes bdag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
380b5('bum): lags pa de yang 'du shes bdag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes bdag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'a du shes bdag pa nyid do// bcom ldan
380b6('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
380b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed bdag pa nyid 'du byed bdag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed bdag pa nyid kyi
381a1('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed bdag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed bdag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed
381a2('bum): bdag pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi
381a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam par shes pa bdag pa nyid kyis stong ste/
381a4('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa bdag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam
381a5('bum): par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
381a6('bum): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs
381a7('bum): zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do//
381b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor
381b2('bum): ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba zhi ba nyid tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba zhi ba nyid ma lags/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid

381b5('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes zhi ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes zhi ba nyid do//
381b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

382a6('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid
382a7('bum): ma mchis te/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ gzugs
382b1('bum): stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o/ / des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyid tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis
382b2('bum): stong ste/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba stong pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba stong pa nyid do/ bcom ldan

383a5('bum): bar gnas par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe
383a6('bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mtshan
383a7('bum): ma pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mtshan ma pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
383b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du
